title: 'I May Destroy You'
description:
‘I May Destroy You’ was recently labeled “the best British TV in years” by Grammy-winning singer Adele. The drama, written by and starring Michaela Coel, captures millennial life, sexual assault, and plenty more with phenomenal nonverbal acting.
Hosts: Juliet Litman and Alyssa Bereznak 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
